```{r setup}
library(collaboratR)
```

This package enables the use of Google Sheets as a collabrative data and meta-
data entry tool  for researchers of different skill sets, 
automated validation of the data using standarized rules, and 
to tracking all changes to data using git


### Components

Automated: 

- pull metadata from google sheets to allow collaboration
- pull data from Google Sheets
- validation using coded rules against standardized rule sets and reporting of errors
- automate pulling 
- commiting data files in text CSV format for change management using git
